project_521_facility.name: Project 521 Research Facility
project_521_facility.description: A state-of-the-art research facility designed for studying the mysterious capsule discovery. The facility includes advanced laboratories, secure storage for artifacts, living quarters for the research team, and quantum computing resources for consciousness studies.
project_521_facility.atmosphere: Clinical yet cutting-edge, with an underlying tension as researchers grapple with discoveries that challenge reality itself.
keyFeatures: Team living quarters and common areas
project_521_facility.significance: Ground zero for the simulation discovery that threatens to unravel everything

mars_colony_central.name: New Geneva Colony
mars_colony_central.description: The largest and most advanced Mars colony, serving as the commercial and administrative hub for Martian civilization. Controlled primarily by Elena Vasquez's Genesis Corporation through economic dominance.
mars_colony_central.atmosphere: Bustling corporate efficiency with underlying social tensions between enhanced and baseline humans
mars_colony_central.significance: Elena's base of operations and testing ground for human enhancement

cult_compound.name: The Awakened Collective Sanctuary
cult_compound.description: A repurposed research facility converted into a commune for Aya Stone's consciousness cult. Designed to isolate members from technological dependency while secretly using advanced surveillance.
cult_compound.atmosphere: Peaceful facade hiding authoritarian control and psychological manipulation
keyFeatures: Central meeting hall for group sessions
cult_compound.significance: Aya's base for building her alternative society and testing consciousness theories

foundation_headquarters.name: Foundation Global Headquarters
foundation_headquarters.description: The secret nerve center of the Foundation's global operations. A combination of classical architecture and cutting-edge technology, reflecting the organization's blend of old-world power and futuristic capabilities.
foundation_headquarters.atmosphere: Cold efficiency masking decades of accumulated power and control
foundation_headquarters.significance: Command center for the conspiracy that threatens human autonomy

genesis_facilities.name: Genesis Corporation Research Complex
genesis_facilities.description: Elena Vasquez's advanced research and development facilities where human genetic modifications are designed, tested, and implemented. Combines medical sophistication with corporate efficiency.
genesis_facilities.atmosphere: Sleek corporate professionalism hiding ethical compromises
genesis_facilities.significance: Ground zero for human enhancement programs that challenge identity

earth_surveillance_centers.name: Foundation Global Monitoring Network
earth_surveillance_centers.description: A network of hidden surveillance and control centers that monitor global communications, influence media narratives, and coordinate Foundation operations across Earth.
earth_surveillance_centers.atmosphere: Paranoid efficiency - watching everything while staying invisible
earth_surveillance_centers.significance: The invisible web of control that maintains Foundation power
